org.hibernate.event.internal

Class DefaultSaveOrUpdateEventListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.event.internal.AbstractReassociateEventListener
      • org.hibernate.event.internal.AbstractSaveEventListener
        • org.hibernate.event.internal.DefaultSaveOrUpdateEventListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, SaveOrUpdateEventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultSaveEventListener, DefaultUpdateEventListener, EJB3SaveOrUpdateEventListener

    public class DefaultSaveOrUpdateEventListener
extends AbstractSaveEventListener
implements SaveOrUpdateEventListener
    Defines the default listener used by Hibernate for handling save-update events.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
